alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; Inland Bay; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 11:59AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Bay, southeastern Walton and Washington Counties through 1145 AM CDT... At 1058 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles northwest of Vernon to 16 miles northeast of Santa Rosa Beach. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Vernon, Bradford, Live Oak, Wausau, Ebro, Hinsons Crossroads, Brock Crossroad, Red Bay, Orange Hill, Whitehead Crossroads, Greenhead, Bruce, Red Head, Holmes Valley, Millers Ferry, Five Points, Knox Hill, Smyrna, Spring Hollow and Sunny Hills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
